638490.name: Soldat
638490.description: Soldat is a unique 2D (side-view) multiplayer action game. It has been influenced by the best of games such as Liero, Worms, Quake, and Counter-Strike and provides a fast-paced gaming experience with tons of blood and flesh. Soldiers fight against each other in 2D battle arenas using a deadly arsenal of military weapons, across 7 default game modes. It features 18 different weapons and 60 maps to frag away on, with full support for user created content.
638490.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 波兰语, 俄语, 瑞典语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
